Summary: Q39 buses are detoured due to a road closure at 58th St/Borden Ave.
Description:
Q39 buses are detoured due to a road closure at 58th St/Borden Ave.
Ridgewood-bound buses will not make stops from Laurel Hill Blvd/48th St to 58th St/56th Dr.
Buses will make stops as requested on 48th St instead.

Long Island City-bound buses will not make stops on 58th St from 55th Dr to 53rd Ave.
Buses will make stops as requested on Maurice Ave instead.

See detour map here.

Note: Bus arrival information may not be accurate or available while buses are detoured.

accessibility icon The nearest accessible subway station connecting with the Q70-SBS is 61 St-Woodside accessibility icon [7]. 

For additional travel alternatives, plan your trip at mta.info, use the MTA app (download the app for iOS or Android), or check our Elevator & Escalator Status page.

What's happening?We're replacing the elevators

Summary: B60 buses are detoured in both directions due to roadwork on Rockaway Ave between Linden Blvd and Farragut Rd.
Description:
B60 buses are detoured in both directions due to roadwork on Rockaway Ave between Linden Blvd and Farragut Rd.
Canarsie-bound buses will not make stops on Rockaway Pkwy and Rockaway Ave from Linden Blvd to Farragut Rd.
Williamsburg Bridge Plaza-bound buses will not make stops on Rockaway Ave and Rockaway Pkwy from Farragut Rd to Ditmas Ave.

Buses will make stops as requested on Remsen Ave and Ditmas Ave instead.

See detour map here.

Note: Bus arrival information may not be accurate or available while buses are detoured.

(See map)

What's happening?

Summary: Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Description:
Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Queens Bus Network Redesign service improvements will be phased in by route on June 29 and August 31, 2025.

Until then, know that your bus route will still serve current stops, but some signs will reflect future service.

Use the MTA app or BusTime to plan your trip.

Learn more about the project at mta.info/queensbus
